about_the_game:
“Slash, Dash and Jump your way to the Highest Score.”

Game Features:


  • Classic 2D side-scrolling arcade action.

  • Beat the clock and your enemies to achieve the High Score.

  • Slash your way through a seemingly endless bamboo overgrowth.

  • Use power-ups to boost your ability.

  • Explore the world of Sam through multiple levels.

  • Become the master of bushido by unlocking the eight virtues.

  • Take on unique enemies in each level.

short_description: Embark on a unique and chaotic adventure with Sam as you fight off invasive bamboo attempting to overtake the family farm and uncover the mystery of your missing family member. Slash your way across multiple levels to get the HIGH-SCORE and save the farm!
